verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I see the King of Glory newline Coming on the clouds with fire newline The whole earth shakes newline The whole earth shakes

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I see His love and mercy newline Washing over all our sin newline The people sing (2x)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Hosanna Hosanna newline Hosanna in the highest (2x)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: I see a generation newline Rising up to take their place newline With selfless faith (2x)

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: I see a near revival newline Stirring as we pray and seek newline We're on our knees (2x)

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Heal my heart and make it clean newline open up my eyes to the things unseen newline show me how to love like You newline Have loved me

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: Break my heart for what breaks Yours newline Everything I am for Your kingdom's cause newline As I walk from earth into eternity
